title: George Kittle weighs in on the Deebo Samuel contract talks
description:
George Kittle weighs in on Deebo Samuel contract talks, Ryan Clark discusses the recent Mike Tomlin interview on The Pivot, and Adam Schefter has an update from the NFL regarding Deshaun Watson and the possibility of a Russell Wilson contract extension.
